subject: FROM MR FRED CARNS KINDLY VIEW A COPY OF MY WORKING ID
body:
[image: US-FDIC-Logo.svg]
<https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:US-FDIC-Logo.svg>
*From:The  Director, Office of International Affairs, *
*FDIC,**1601 Bryan Str,Dallars, TX 75201, USA**.*

Attn Brittany
*.*
Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) writes to acknowledge receipt of
your email without your identification ID, kindly accept our apologies for
the late response, Regards to your update which you requested to more about
the receivership authorization, kindly note, the exact cost of the
receivership authorization is* $550* only and it ios what will guarantee
the reflection of the transfer into your account.

Please kindly confirm this information as you will have to pay the fee  via
Money Order or money gram any of the approved means of payment.  Meanwhile,
kindly let us know which means is preferable by you so we can provide you
with the receiving information. Also reconfirm the below information.

Your Account Name----------------------------
Your Account Number--- ---------------------
Your Account swift Code--- ------------------
Your Next Of Kin Name-------------------------------
Your Occupation---- -------------------------------
Your Bank Name--- -----------------------------
Your Bank Address--- ------------------------
Your Bank Phone Number--- -----------------------
Your Private Email address--................

Ensure that this information is supplied accurately. Once we hear from you
we shall direct you on how to make the fee available to this Corporation.
Once again note that the cost of the Receivership Authorization is* $550*
only.  Kindly View a copy of my official working ID. I shall be  waiting
for your swift response.


*Thank you.*

*Fred S Carns,*
*Director, Office of International Affairs*

subject: Re: FROM MR FRED CARNS KINDLY VIEW A COPY OF MY WORKING ID
body:
Hello Fred Carns,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with this information. I appreciate your prompt response. I would like to know more about the transfer process and the fee that needs to be paid. Could you please explain in more detail what the fee is for and how it guarantees the reflection of the transfer into my account?

Regarding the means of payment, could you please provide me with more information about Money Order and money gram? Which one is more secure and reliable? Also, if I choose to pay via Money Order or money gram, where should I send it?

In order to proceed further, I would like to confirm a few details:

1. My Account Name:
2. My Account Number:
3. My Account Swift Code:
4. My Next Of Kin Name:
5. My Occupation:
6. My Bank Name:
7. My Bank Address:
8. My Bank Phone Number:
9. My Private Email:

Once I have these details confirmed, I will be able to proceed accordingly.

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Brittany

subject: FROM MR FRED CARNS
body:
[image: US-FDIC-Logo.svg]
<https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:US-FDIC-Logo.svg>
*From:The  Director, Office of International Affairs, *
*FDIC,**1601 Bryan Str,Dallars, TX 75201, USA**.*

Attn Brittany
*.*
Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) writes to acknowledge receipt of
your email. However, you fail to suppy the banking details that was
requested from you and you rather asking me to provide you with my banking
particulars.

Kindly do what you are asked to do.


*Thank you.*

*Fred S Carns,*
*Director, Office of International Affairs*

subject: Re: FROM MR FRED CARNS
body:
Hello Fred Carns,

Thank you for your response. I apologize for not providing the banking details as requested. I must have misunderstood your previous email. Could you please clarify what specific banking details you are referring to? I want to make sure I provide the correct information.

Best wishes,
Brittany
